edu.rit.slides.items
Class ColorFill

java.lang.Object
  edu.rit.slides.items.ColorFill
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Fill, Serializable
public class ColorFill
extends Object
implements Fill

Class ColorFill provides an object that fills an area in a SlideItem with a solid color.

See Also:
Serialized Form
